name: sugarimobile
version: g Blood Glucose, Food Intake (with carbs), Insulin Doses, HbA1c, Weight, and Blood Pressure readings. Includes input validation and notes fields.- Data Logging Screens: Dedicated forms for addin
description: it is a app using reactnative sqllite and it is for diabetics to log and manage their blood sugar, it already has many features built out onto it but it has a dashboard and uses native charts to visualize the inputted data. Purpose: Develop a comprehensive mobile application using React Native (Expo) and TypeScript for personal diabetes management. The app enables users to easily track and monitor various health metrics crucial for managing diabetes.
author: all entries using native pickers (with iOS-specific handling).- Timestamping: Consistent date and time selection for
